name: 'Internal Displacement' Trivia Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Will thought CJ was blaming him for something, who did he say was the real culprit?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	CJ called Will into her office to see if he would find out what he could about an affair that Doug Westin might or might not have had with his children's nanny.

questions.text: Can you finish this quote made by CJ? "I feel like I'm handing out towels at the ________________."
questions.explanation:
Playboy mansion.

	CJ was talking to Will about the possible affair that Doug Westin had with his nanny and the sex scandal that the ex-Vice President went through three years ago while in office.

questions.text: What did Kate think should happen to Doug for having an affair with his children's nanny?
questions.explanation:
Death.

	When CJ told Kate about Doug's affair Kate told CJ he should die and that they should get a special forces team to kill him so Liz could mourn properly.

questions.text: When CJ had her first dinner date with Danny, what food did she say was stupid to sell at restaurants?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	Danny and CJ met for their first dinner date on a Wednesday night and that's where he told her the rumors of Doug Westin's affair.

questions.text: Did Will think that Doug had an affair?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Will told CJ if she was interested in a male perspective that Doug probably did have an affair because the nanny was really cute.

questions.text: Where was the first molecular transport lab that Santos wanted the President to speak at with him?
questions.explanation:
Austin.

	Josh was trying to get CJ to have the President meet Santos in Austin and then the two of them could fly to Kentucky together, but CJ wouldn't do it so Josh fixed a press conference with Santos so CJ would have to get the President to show up with Santos in Austin.

questions.text: Who said this, "If I'm going to jump off this cliff and your going to get pushed off the cliff why don't we hold hands on the way down"?
questions.explanation:
Danny.

	When CJ met Danny again to make up for the Wednesday night dinner she had to leave, Danny started making a speech which CJ interrupted because she was called back to the White House.

questions.text: Did the President go to Manchester to help Doug with his election?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After realizing that it would be an embarrassment to the President and his family due to the rumors of the affair, CJ made Doug turn down the offer for the President to go to Connecticut to stump for Doug and his campaign. Liz asked her to reconsider, but CJ had the date filled already.

questions.text: Where was the nuclear power plant located that was in trouble?
questions.explanation:
California.

	CJ was called away from her second dinner with Danny by Kate who told her that a nuclear power plant in San Adrea, California was in trouble.

questions.text: Did CJ have to tell Liz about the affair that Doug had with his children's nanny?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Liz let CJ know in her own way that she knew of the affair Doug had, but she wanted the children to be proud of their father and that's why she wanted her father to help Doug with his campaign.
